sources.title: The Bride and the Beast (1958) ED WOOD, JR.
sources.description:
It's Friday at PizzaFLIX
Screenplay: Edward D. Wood, Jr.
Starring: Charlotte Austin, Lance Fuller
Get ready for a Twisted, Jungle adventure from the angora-warped mind of Ed Wood, Jr. ! On her wedding night, a bride is more interested in a caged gorilla than in her big-game-hunter husband. Could she have been the Queen of the Gorillas in a former life?

sources.title: The Bride and the Beast (1958) Edward D. Wood Jr, Charlotte Austin | Full Movie
sources.description:
When Laura and Dan get married, she's more interested in Dan's gorilla. It's revealed through hypnosis that she was Queen of the Gorillas in a previous incarnation.

Original title: The Bride and the Beast (1958) 

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/xu8UEoZUq4U


Many subtitle languages options available for this movie
This movie has additional audio commentary by Tom Weaver, joined by Charlotte Austin & Bob Burns.  To activate the audio commentary go to settings ⚙️ and select "Interlingue" from the audio options menu.

Director: Adrian Weiss
Writers: Edward D. Wood Jr., Adrian Weiss
Stars: Charlotte Austin, Lance Fuller, Johnny Roth
Genres: Adventure, Fantasy, Mystery

00:00 Full Movie
01:42 A couple goes on a safari trip in Africa, encountering wild animals and facing unexpected challenges.
06:25 A surreal and unsettling dream involving a monkey and a sense of deja vu.
19:30 A man discusses his recurring dreams of being chased by wild animals and contemplates the concept of past lives.
23:46 A woman undergoes hypnosis and reveals personal details while in a deep sleep.
28:00 A man attempts to regress to a past life through hypnosis, experiencing a jungle and encountering various animals.
32:20 A woman undergoes a hypnosis session and believes she is a gorilla, leading to a discussion about a planned honeymoon in Africa.
37:03 Exploring the African wilderness with a focus on wildlife photography and conservation.
46:41 A thrilling conversation about hunting tigers and the dangers of the jungle.
55:31 A woman is attacked by a tiger and exhibits unusual animal behavior after being hypnotized.
